explains: n. 室内便鞋，拖鞋；轻便舞鞋

sentences.en: His father meted out punishment with a slipper.
sentences.cn: 他父亲用一只拖鞋来进行处罚。

sentences.en: He observed that if there are too many toys in front of Cameron, he will just keep moving round them and then end up going away and finding something like a slipper to play with.
sentences.cn: 他观察到，如果卡梅隆面前的玩具太多，他就会一直绕着玩具转，最后会走开，转而找个拖鞋之类的东西玩。

sentences.en: You left your glass slipper at the party the other night.
sentences.cn: 你那晚把水晶鞋落在派对上了。
